trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 모든 기본 클래스를 나타냅니다. <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event to respond when the user clicks a ButtonBase.
trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>는 ButtonBase를 클릭할 때 응답 하는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The user can raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event by using an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 사용자를 발생 시킬 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>를 사용 하 여 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>하거나 컨트롤에 포커스가 있을 때 ENTER 또는 스페이스바를 누르면.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> to `true` and captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 컨트롤 집합 스페이스바를 누르면 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>를 `true` 마우스를 캡처합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 결과적으로, 컨트롤 등 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> 마우스 이벤트를 발생시킬지

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> or capture the mouse, but it does raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 사용는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>ENTER 바뀌지 않으면 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>또는 마우스를 캡처 하지만 높일 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonBase sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A> attached property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ButtonBase 집합은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>연결 된 속성을 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonBase sets the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: ButtonBase 집합은 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A>속성을 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A ButtonBase is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: ButtonBase은는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, 즉, 모든 형식 (예: 문자열, 이미지 또는 패널)의 단일 개체가 포함 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> 를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> 를 클릭 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The user can raise the Click event by using an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 사용자를 사용 하 여 클릭 이벤트를 발생 시킬 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>하거나 컨트롤에 포커스가 있을 때 ENTER 또는 스페이스바를 누르면.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> to `true` and captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 컨트롤 집합 스페이스바를 누르면 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>를 `true` 마우스를 캡처합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 결과적으로, 컨트롤 등 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> 마우스 이벤트를 발생시킬지

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> or capture the mouse, but it does raise the Click event.
trans-unit.target: 사용는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>ENTER 바뀌지 않으면 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>또는 마우스를 캡처 하지만 Click 이벤트를 높일 수는 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase> marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method and raises the Click event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>표시는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>이벤트에서 처리 된 것으로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>메서드 Click 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: Hence, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> event will never occur for a control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>이벤트 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase> 에서 상속 되는 컨트롤에 대 한 절대 발생 하지</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 대신에 이벤트 처리기를 연결 된 <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>이벤트 또는 호출 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>와 `handledEventsToo` 로 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # 이벤트 정보 라우트된 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 라우팅 전략 | 버블링 | | 대리자 | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> 라우트된 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: This event corresponds to a left mouse button click.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트는 마우스 왼쪽된 단추 클릭에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: When the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 이 단추를 누를 때 호출할 명령을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to associate a command with a particular button instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 특정 단추 인스턴스가 명령과 연결을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], this property is most often set to be a static command value from one of the existing command libraries, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)],이 속성을 가장 많이 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands> 같은 기존 명령 라이브러리 중 하나에서 정적 명령 값으로 설정

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [명령 실행 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 나 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *commandName* The command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *commandName* 이 단추를 누를 때 호출할 명령입니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 이 단추를 누를 때 호출할 명령입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 전달할 매개 변수를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Most existing commands from the command libraries do not use a command parameter.
trans-unit.target: 명령 라이브러리부터 대부분의 기존 명령을 명령 매개 변수를 사용 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Of the commands that do use a command parameter, most of these take a parameter with some primitive type value, such as an integer or a string.
trans-unit.target: 명령 매개 변수를 사용 하 여 수행 하는 명령의 이들 중 대부분 정수 또는 문자열 같은 몇 가지 기본 유형 값을 가진 매개 변수를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: However, it is possible to create a custom command where that command expects a nonprimitive type as its command parameter.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 있기 사용자 지정 명령을 만들려면 명령의 명령 매개 변수로 기본 형식이 필요 합니다. 여기서.

trans-unit.source: For a custom command case like this, setting CommandParameter in code might require a new or existing object instance.
trans-unit.target: 다음과 같이 사용자 지정 명령 사례에 대 한 CommandParameter 코드에 설정 하면 기존 또는 새 개체 인스턴스를 필요할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting CommandParameter in markup might require property element syntax, where the object element filling the property element syntax is a new element of the type expected by that command.
trans-unit.target: 태그에서 CommandParameter 설정, 여기서 속성 요소 구문을 채우기 개체 요소는 해당 명령에 의해 허용 된 형식의 새 요소에 속성 요소 구문이 필요할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, setting in markup might require a reference through a markup extension to an existing object (typically these references are made with [Binding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: 또는 태그에서 설정 기존 개체에 태그 확장을 통해 대 한 참조를 필요할 수 있습니다 (일반적으로 이러한 참조도 이루어진 [바인딩 태그 확장](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 또는 [StaticResource 태그 확장](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *commandParameter* A value of the same type as the particular command specified in the property expects.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *commandParameter* 에 지정 된 특정 명령으로 동일한 형식의 값은 속성에&16;.

trans-unit.source: If you use an existing command library command, see that command library's documentation for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, including which type of CommandParameter the command expects.
trans-unit.target: 기존 명령 라이브러리 명령을 사용 하는 경우 해당 명령은 라이브러리의 설명서를 참조 하십시오. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 사용 정보를 어떤 유형의 CommandParameter 명령에서는 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you use a custom command, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 명령을 사용 하는 경우 설명을 참조 하세요.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: Parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 전달할 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the routed <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element on which to raise the specified command.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 명령을 할 요소를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property cannot be used to define a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 정의 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 하 CommandTarget 속성을 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property provides a reference to an element that is already defined somewhere in your application.
trans-unit.target: CommandTarget 속성 응용 프로그램의 어딘가에 이미 정의 되어 있는 요소에 대 한 참조를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *elementName* The name of that receives the command.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *elementName* 이름을 명령을 받는입니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: Element on which to raise a command.
trans-unit.target: 명령을 실행할는 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*> property.
trans-unit.target: 값을 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: If you choose to override this implementation, make certain that you call the base method.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현을 재정의 하려는 경우 반드시 기본 메서드를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컨트롤을 사용 하면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> is currently activated.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"> </xref> 가 현재 활성화 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: IsPressed is the state of a button that indicates the left mouse button or SPACEBAR is pressed over the button.
trans-unit.target: IsPressed 마우스 왼쪽된 단추를 나타내는 단추의 상태 또는 단추 위로 스페이스바를 누르면 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: When IsPressed is `true`, the control captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: IsPressed 다음과 같은 경우 `true`, 컨트롤에서 마우스를 캡처할 합니다.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 결과적으로, 컨트롤 등 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> 마우스 이벤트를 발생시킬지

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change IsPressed or capture the mouse, but is does raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 사용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>ENTER IsPressed 변경 되지 않거나에 마우스가 캡처 또는 발생 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsPressed has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 버전 3.0 부터는 서비스 팩 1, IsPressed는 보호 된 setter에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 이 기능을 사용 하려면 응용 프로그램은.NET Framework 버전 3.5 대상으로 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [버전 및 종속성](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> is activated; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"> </xref> 활성화 되지 않았으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for this control is called.
trans-unit.target: 응답 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>이 컨트롤은 호출 된.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A> is `true`, this method calls the base implementation, which gives this control focus.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A>은 `true`,이 메서드는이 컨트롤의 포커스를 제공 하는 기본 구현을 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면이 메서드에서 발생는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 데이터는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> 라우트된 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> 를 호출 하 여 이벤트</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> 를 발생 시킵니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [라우트된 이벤트 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 될 때 호출 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>속성 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>

trans-unit.source: The data for <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터 <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> 이 컨트롤에 포커스가 있을 때 키를 누를 때 발생 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> and one of the following cases are true: - The user presses the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>이벤트를 설정 하 여 처리 된 것으로 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>에 이벤트 데이터의 `true` 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>로 설정 되지 않은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>하나에 다음과 같은 경우 및:-스페이스바를 누르면.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: - The user presses ENTER and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A> is `true` for this control.
trans-unit.target: -사용자가 ENTER 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>은 `true` 이 컨트롤에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event data.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서 다른 모든 경우의 처리 상태를 변경 되지 않습니다 (의 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>속성)의 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>이벤트 데이터입니다.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user releases a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> 이 컨트롤에 포커스가 있을 때 키를 놓을 때 발생 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when the user releases the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>이벤트를 설정 하 여 처리 된 것으로 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>에 이벤트 데이터의 `true` 놓으면 스페이스바.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event data.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면이 구현 처리 상태 변경 되지 않습니다 (의 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>속성)의 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>이벤트 데이터입니다.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 데이터는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when an element loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 키보드 포커스를 잃을 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 데이터는 <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement.LostKeyboardFocus"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref> routed event that occurs when this control is no longer receiving mouse event messages.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"> </xref> 이 컨트롤은 더 이상 마우스 이벤트 메시지를 받을 때 발생 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> event data.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현은 처리 상태를 변경 되지 않습니다 (의 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>속성)의 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture>이벤트 데이터입니다.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 데이터는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*> routed event that occurs when the mouse enters this control.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>라우트된 이벤트에 마우스가이 컨트롤에 들어가면 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, this implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>,이 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>이벤트를 설정 하 여 처리 된 것으로 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>에 이벤트 데이터의 `true` 를 발생 시킵니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 데이터는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse leaves an element.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"> </xref> 마우스가 요소를 벗어날 때 발생 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>이벤트를 설정 하 여 처리 된 것으로 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>에 이벤트 데이터의 `true` 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>를 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 데이터는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> 마우스 포인터가이 컨트롤 위에 있는 동안 마우스 왼쪽된 단추를 누를 때 발생 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>이벤트를 설정 하 여 처리 된 것으로 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>에 이벤트 데이터의 `true` 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> 로 설정 되지 않은</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 에 응답 하는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>이벤트를 이벤트 처리기를 연결 하는 <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>이벤트 또는 호출 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>와 `handledEventsToo` 로 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>,이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"> </xref> 마우스 포인터가이 컨트롤 위에 있는 동안 마우스 왼쪽된 단추를 놓을 때 발생 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>이벤트를 설정 하 여 처리 된 것으로 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>에 이벤트 데이터의 `true` 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> 로 설정 되지 않은</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 에 응답 하는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>이벤트를 이벤트 처리기를 연결 하는 <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp>이벤트 또는 호출 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>와 `handledEventsToo` 로 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> is `true`, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>은 `true`,이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse pointer moves while over this element.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref> 이 요소 위에 있는 동안 마우스 포인터를 움직이면 발생 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>이벤트를 설정 하 여 처리 된 것으로 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>에 이벤트 데이터의 `true` 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>로 설정 되지 않은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>은 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 에 응답 하는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>이벤트를 이벤트 처리기를 연결 하는 <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove>이벤트 또는 호출 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>와 `handledEventsToo` 로 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when the rendered size of a control changes.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 렌더링 된 크기가 변경 될 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the OnRenderSizeChanged method of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> OnRenderSizeChanged 메서드 재정의

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size changes.
trans-unit.target: 크기 변화를 지정합니다.
